title: I found a skin that I really hate through hextech craft, but I wasn't able to disenchant it.
body:
I've just found Dawnchaser Sejuani by rerolling 3 skins through the hextech crafting system.

Since I didn't own it, the client unlocked it for me immediately, but I really REALLY hate that skin: its splash art is awful (there's something really wrong with her face, her bidimensional ears and her twisted right arm) and I dislike its colour scheme as well (I don't think it fits well with the icy feeling of Sejauni's spells). I tried to give it a chance and played a coop game with it, but I really can't stand it (I can't even stare at her portrait for a second because that odd-looking face makes me feel uncomfortable).

Would it be possible to trade the skin for its disenchant value in orange essences and then remove it from my account?

replies.body: Rerolling 3 skin shard will always result in a permanent since that is how the system is designed. Since permanent's are automatically added by design, I'm not sure if our billing agents will be able to reverse and give the associated orange essence value for it, but it's always worth to ask them in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)!
To add to this, permanent shards are only not automatically added to your collection if you own everything in that category, and thus have gotten a duplicate of something you already own.
